headline: Snowflake AI Push And OpenAI Deal Test Long Term Growth Story
summary: Snowflake launched its Cortex Code AI agent and expanded its AI feature set, aiming to automate data engineering and enable natural language interactions. The company announced a partnership with OpenAI focused on contextual AI applications using data already on the Snowflake platform. Enterprises including United Rentals, Wolfspeed, and U.S. Figure Skating are adopting Snowflake's AI tools for real-world workloads. For investors watching NYSE:SNOW, these product moves come at a time when...
